sentences.eng: – If you feel like doing a psychological test
sentences.rus: А. – Если вам хочется пройти [психологический|психолог|a psychologist] тест

sentences.eng: and learning something new about yourself,
I will be very glad to help you.
sentences.rus: то я буду рад вам помочь.

sentences.eng: Take a seat, please,
and try to answer the questions honestly.
sentences.rus: и постарайтесь честно [отвечать|отвечать|to answer] на [вопросы|вопрос|a question].

sentences.eng: – Thank you.
I’ll try do my best.
– So, the first question:
who in your family makes you feel annoyed most often?
sentences.rus: [кто|кто|who] вас чаще [всего|всего, только|only] раздражает в вашей [семье|семья|a family]?

sentences.eng: – My wife’s parents.
– The second one:
what usually makes you feel mad?
– Shopping.
– The third one:
when do you feel like running away from home?
– I feel like running away from home
when our neighbors are making repairs.
– The fourth one: what usually makes you feel happy?
– I am happy
when I am alone at home.
– The fifth one:
what cheers you up most of all?
– A cup of strong coffee with cognac.
– The sixth one:
what kills your mood most often?
sentences.rus: что чаще [всего|всего, только|only] портит вам настроение?

sentences.eng: – My mother-in-law’s nonstop blab.
– And finally, the last question:
sentences.rus: А. – И [наконец|наконей; в заключение|lastly], последний [вопрос|вопрос|a question]:

sentences.eng: is there anything in the world except solitude
sentences.rus: есть что-нибудь на свете, кроме одиночества,

sentences.eng: that can make you feel happy?
– It’s difficult for me to answer this question.
sentences.rus: Б. – Мне [трудно|трудно|hard; difficult] ответить на этот [вопрос|вопрос|a question].

sentences.eng: – Well.
Here are the results of your psychological test:
you are a textbook introvert,
and you shouldn’t spend much time with your relatives,
sentences.rus: и вам не [следует|следовать|to follow] много времени проводить со своими [родственниками|родственник|a relative],

sentences.eng: especially with your wife’s parents.
– Thank you so much!
You really made me feel happy!
Can I have my test results, please?
– Here you are.
– I’ll show it to my wife.
sentences.rus: Б. – Я покажу его моей жене.

sentences.eng: Of course,
I don’t feel like making her feel upset,
sentences.rus: мне не [очень|очень|very] хочется ее [расстраивать|расстраивать кого-л|to make smb feel upset],

sentences.eng: but I’ll have to…
